entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with rain ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
